programme.title: Dave Gorman: Terms and Conditions Apply
programme.sub-title: A Really Low Budget Star Trek
programme.desc: Using his trademark, powerpoint-comedy and a series of mischievous games, Dave invites Jimmy Carr, Cariad Lloyd and Phill Jupitus to help him make sense of our insensible world.

programme.title: Have I Got a Bit More News for You
programme.sub-title: Have I Got a Bit More Old News for You
programme.desc: David Mitchell hosts an extended edition of the quiz from November 2018, with Andy Hamilton and Deborah Frances-White joining team captains Paul Merton and Ian Hislop.

programme.title: QI XL
programme.desc: Stephen Fry hosts an extended edition of the comedy quiz show, in which he awards points for answers he finds most interesting. This edition sees Noel Fielding, Rhod Gilbert and Cariad Lloyd join regular panellist Alan Davies to tackle miscellaneous M-themed matters.

programme.title: Mock the Week
programme.desc: Topical comedy quiz show, hosted by Dara O Briain. Regular panellist Hugh Dennis looks back on another eventful week in news and politics, with the help of guests Ed Byrne, Ed Gamble, Kerry Godliman, Nish Kumar and Rachel Parris. Stand-up and improvisation are the name of the game as the contestants try to get one up on each other.

programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.desc: Lee thinks the twins are too young to be taught about sex at school and that their teacher Miss Anstis is too stuck up to teach it. He resolves that it is his duty as a father to teach his children everything he knows about the facts of life, discovering only when it is too late that his knowledge is somewhat limited. Comedy, starring Lee Mack and Sally Bretton.

programme.title: The Indestructibles
programme.desc: Thanks to back flips and rail rides, Tim and Gendle are in BMX bike heaven. With the clock ticking it is down to Joe and the build team to construct the ultimate BMX set-up.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Train Truckers
programme.desc: Zak and Alex face a four-day mission to deliver a pair of classic steam locomotives for an Autumn Steam Gala at the Mid Hants Railway in Hampshire.

programme.title: Impossible Engineering
programme.desc: Chinese authorities attempt a huge infrastructure project as they try to move vast amounts of water from the wet south of the country to the dry north.

programme.title: Jim Clark: The Quiet Champion
programme.desc: Profile of the two-time Formula One champion, who was killed at the height of his career. Featuring rare archive footage from family home-movies, candid interviews with the driver himself and comments by close friends, including Jackie Stewart, who reminisces about their time spent together racing when they were known as Batman and Robin.

programme.title: Graham Hill: Driven
programme.desc: An intimate portrait of motor racing star Graham Hill, who became the only man to win the Formula One World Championship, Indianapolis 500 and Le Mans 24-hour race - but whose reckless streak was to prove his undoing. Among those sharing their memories of the charismatic Englishman are his son Damon - who became Formula One world champion himself in 1996 - and Jackie Stewart.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Lady Chatterley
programme.desc: Sir Clifford employs a nurse to look after him, leaving his wife with more time to devote to her clandestine relationship with Mellors. However, the passion of the affair is beginning to wane. Starring Joely Richardson and Sean Bean.

programme.title: Trial & Retribution
programme.desc: Lynda La Plante's crime drama. DI Pat North investigates the case of a woman abducted in broad daylight, but a sudden murder confession leaves the squad with more questions than answers. Meanwhile, DCS Michael Walker begins to fear for his children's safety at the hands of his ex-wife's new boyfriend. Kate Buffery and David Hayman star.

programme.title: Lovejoy
programme.desc: Part two of two. The roguish antiques dealer finds a Scottish gothic temple brings him closer to Lady Jane, while love is in the air for Eric. Ian McShane stars.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Press Preview
programme.desc: A preview of the stories appearing in tomorrow's national newspapers.

programme.title: Sky News
programme.desc: A summary of the latest news headlines.

programme.title: The River Wild (1994)
programme.desc: A headstrong white-water rafting expert embarks on a holiday with her family, but their fun comes to an abrupt end when two killers show up. The fugitives' only escape route from the law is down a raging river, so they take the woman and her son hostage to act as guides. Meanwhile, her husband desperately tries to keep track from the riverbank, waiting for his opportunity to launch a rescue attempt. Action thriller, starring Meryl Streep, Kevin Bacon, David Strathairn, Joseph Mazzello and John C Reilly.

programme.title: ITV Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service.

programme.title: Babushka
programme.desc: Game show in which contestants answer questions to get the chance to open a set of giant Russian nesting dolls, with some empty and others containing prizes up to Â£10,000. Rylan Clark-Neal asks the questions.

programme.title: ITV Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service.

programme.title: Kisstory Superstars
programme.desc: Back-to-back hits from some of Kisstory's biggest superstars...

programme.title: Up All Night! Kiss Beats
programme.desc: Let the world sleep! But here at Kiss we are still up, still delivering the finest beats for your nocturnal jam.

programme.title: Chart Hits & New Vids
programme.desc: We've got all the hits that are storming the charts right now, along with some brand new releases from your favourite and new artists.

programme.title: The Saturday Hotmix!
programme.desc: An exclusive, non-stop mix of the hottest songs to soundtrack your Saturday evening!.

programme.title: Hit After Hit
programme.desc: Nothing but the biggest hits by your favourite stars back to back.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: The Tunnel Rats are under extra pressure as rival miners close in on their claim. Plus, the Bushmen must brave an abandoned mine to remove a dead animal.

programme.title: World's Deepest Goldmine
programme.desc: South Africa's Mponeng mine reaches 3,500km into the ground, but its gold reserves are almost exhausted. This documentary questions whether the risks posed to the underground workers justify burying even deeper into the Earth.

programme.title: King Tut's Mystery Tomb Opened
programme.desc: Egyptologist Otto Schaden and a team of archaeologists continue their excavations of a burial chamber in the necropolis used by the pharaohs beneath Egypt's legendary Valley of the Kings, a tomb known only as KV63.

programme.title: American Chopper
programme.desc: The team works on a bike for Gladiator Garageworks, while Mikey performs his comedy act live, Paul Jr appears on Adam Carolla's podcast, and Paul Sr shares news about a loved one.

programme.title: Airplane Repo
programme.desc: Ken and Danny race to beat rival repo men on a yacht heist, while Mike finds himself in a high stakes game of 'chicken' between a jet and a Lamborghini.

programme.title: Dirty Jobs
programme.desc: Mike Rowe joins a team trying to catch wild chickens on the streets of Miami - and discovers the birds can be highly cunning adversaries.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.sub-title: Mountain Bike Suspensions/Surgical Sutures/Grain Dryers/Frying Pans
programme.desc: The documentary explores the design and production of mountain bike suspensions, surgical sutures, grain dryers and frying pans.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.sub-title: Ski Bindings/Immersion Parts Washers/ Mine Ventilation/Pencil Sharpeners
programme.desc: The development and manufacturing processes behind the creation of downhill ski bindings, immersion parts washers, mining ventilation equipment, and pencil sharpeners.

programme.title: Dead of Winter
programme.desc: The murders of an elderly North Dakota couple during an attack in their home. Detectives discovered a crime scene hopelessly compromised.

programme.title: Forensic Detectives
programme.desc: Scientific methods of solving crimes, sometimes centuries after they were committed.

programme.title: Murder on CCTV
programme.desc: Unspeakable crimes solved with the help of CCTV, focusing on the case of two Florida parents brutally gunned down. Investigators had to rely on surveillance cameras to catch the killers and bring them to justice.

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: A case from Oklahoma, where the Long Branch Saloon was the local hangout for many in the small town of Poteau. However, its beloved proprietor Joe Neff went missing in 2009, leaving behind a splatter of blood. His body was later retrieved from an old mining strip pit, but the identity of his killer remained a mystery.

programme.title: FBI Files
programme.desc: Examining a murder investigation in which police turned to the FBI's crime laboratory after encountering difficulties in identifying a woman's body.

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: The SPCA seizes a hoard of sick animals, including several roosters, a goat and a pregnant cat. Plus, investigator Scott Wernick confiscates numerous dogs that have been left to fend for themselves.

programme.title: Bondi Vet
programme.desc: Dr Chris Brown turns his attention to an amorous rabbit, a malnourished platypus and a pet that has escaped multiple times.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Bride Kristy wants to look like a pirate at her wedding, while Laura's father does not shy away from voicing his ideas on the perfect dress.
